attributes.action: check all immigrants coming into the uk for crimal records etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the sia was set up to stop people working in the security industry who have criminal records so why are there so many foreign workers in this industry given sia approval with out record check from there native country.i believe all the foreign people working in this sector of employment should not be given sia approval without full crb checks done from the country they have arrived from.
